DOC.brief_summary: This 15 week study compare well duloxetine placebo treatment improve generalize anxiety disorder
DOC.criteria: Psychiatric Diagnosis generalize anxiety disorder ( GAD ) Outpatients Meet Diagnostic Statistical Manual Mental Disorders , Fourth Edition ( DSMIV ) diagnosis GAD Clinical Global Impression ( CGI ) Severity Score least moderate Sheehan Disability Scale ( SDS ) Global Functioning Impairment Score > = 12 Pregnancy breast feed Serious medical illness Other primary psychiatric diagnosis , major depressive disorder substance abuse disorder within past 6 month panic disorder , posttraumatic stress disorder ( PTSD ) , eat disorder last year lifetime history bipolar psychosis Any unstable serious medical condition duloxetine would allow Any use medication allow
